description: React component 'Rail' that displays a horizontally scrollable list of thumbnail cards with keyboard navigation support. Handles focus management, lazy loading, and error/loading states.

methods.name: Rail({ title, items = [], railIndex = 0, currentRail, setCurrentRail, onOpenDetails, loading = false, error = null })
methods.description: Main React component for displaying a horizontally scrollable list of thumbnail cards with keyboard and focus management.
